GRAPE:
With your Grape rewards, you can:
1. Compound into more Nodes
2. Single stake Grape in the Vineyard to earn Wine
3. Pair Grape with BUSD and stake it in the Vineyard to earn Wine
WINE:
With your Wine rewards, you can:
1. Stake Wine in Winery to earn Grape (when above 1.01 TWAP)
2. Pair with BUSD or Grape and stake in the Vineyard to earn more Wine
3. Pair with BUSD and stake in the Winepress to earn more Wine-BUSD LP
AKUSD-BUSD-LP:
With your AKUSD-BUSD-LP rewards, you can:
1. Compound into more Nodes
2. Stake AKUSD-BUSD SW LP in the Vineyard to earn Wine
3. Break the LP, and buy more Grape with the BUSD
GRAPE-WLRS-LP:
With your GRAPE-WLRS-LP rewards, you can:
1. Compound into more Nodes
2. Break the LP and single stake Grape in the Vineyard to earn Wine
